name: eslint-config-standard
notes: ESLint shareable config for JavaScript Standard Style linting. ESLint configurations define linting rules, parser options, and plugin configurations for the ESLint linter. Used exclusively during development/CI workflows to enforce JavaScript Standard Style code conventions (no semicolons, 2-space indentation, single quotes, etc.). Configured in .eslintrc via extends: ['standard']. Not applicable to Workers which is a runtime environment, not a linting/development environment. Similar ESLint configs include eslint-config-airbnb, eslint-config-google, eslint-config-prettier.
